column1: Smoque BBQ////I respect your position on high fructose corn syrup.  But just to clarify
column2: we use light brown sugar as the sweetener in our sauce.  However
column3: we use leading brand of ketchup as the base for the sauce.  The high fructose corn syrup is a sub-ingredient in the ketchup
column4: as it is in most commercially available ketchups.  We don't use anything but brown sugar and white cane sugar at the restaurant and in our bottled sauce.
